pgvector/pgvector

vector search for Postgres databases

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • PostgreSQL vector support for Django, SQLAlchemy, and more
  • PostgreSQL extension for faster, scalable vector search and storage in AI apps
  • Cross-platform vector search extension for SQLite
  • serves a REST API from a PostgreSQL database
  • vector search for SQLite, works anywhere
  • Builds ActiveRecord named scopes for PostgreSQL full text search
  • Embeds SQLite databases in PostgreSQL tables
  • PostgreSQL extension for BM25-based text search and sparse vector queries
  • Graph-vector database for building AI and RAG apps, unifies structure and semantic search
  • run Postgres in browser or Node with WASM
